code:
flowchart TB
  %% =========================
  %% REPOSITORY & CI
  %% =========================
  subgraph Repo["Source Control"]
    GIT[(Git Repository)]
  end

  subgraph CI["CI / CD"]
    CI1[Lint + Tests]
    CI2[Build Docker Images]
  end

  %% =========================
  %% DATA LAYER
  %% =========================
  subgraph DataLayer["Data Layer"]
    RAW[(Raw Fakeddit Data)]
    ART[(Artifacts\nmodels, logs)]
  end

  %% =========================
  %% TRAINING CONTAINER
  %% =========================
  subgraph TrainC["Training Container"]
    DP[Data Pipeline]
    MT[Multimodal Model]
    TR[Trainer\nPyTorch Lightning]
    EV[Evaluation]
  end

  %% =========================
  %% SERVING CONTAINER
  %% =========================
  subgraph ServeC["Serving Container"]
    API[FastAPI / gRPC]
    PRE[Preprocessing]
    INF[Inference Engine]
  end

  %% =========================
  %% FLOWS
  %% =========================
  GIT --> CI
  CI --> TrainC
  RAW --> DP
  DP --> MT --> TR --> ART
  TR --> EV
  ART --> ServeC
  API --> PRE --> INF --> API
